titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation declaring those of Scotland, who have entred, or shall enter this kingdom in a vvarlike manner, and their adherents, to be rebels and traitours to His Majestie.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: VVhitehall, the twentieth day of August, in the sixteenth yeer of His Majesties reign.
